TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IExtendPropertySheet

summary.span: 啟用嵌入式管理單元元件，將屬性頁加入至項目的屬性工作表 (Property Sheet)。

span.span: Enables a snap-in component to add property pages to the property sheet of an item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關使用 IExtendPropertySheet 介面和 Microsoft Management Console (MMC) 進行程式設計的詳細資訊，請參閱[MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the IExtendPropertySheet interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

MemberSignature.Value: public int CreatePropertyPages (Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.IPropertySheetCallback lpProvider, IntPtr handle, Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.IDataObject lpIDataObject);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 CreatePropertyPages(class Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.IPropertySheetCallback lpProvider, native int handle, class Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.IDataObject lpIDataObject) cil managed
Public Function CreatePropertyPages (lpProvider As IPropertySheetCallback, handle As IntPtr, lpIDataObject As IDataObject) As Integer
public: int CreatePropertyPages(Microsoft::Aspnet::Snapin::IPropertySheetCallback ^ lpProvider, IntPtr handle, Microsoft::Aspnet::Snapin::IDataObject ^ lpIDataObject);

param.name: handle
param.span: 用來將告知訊息 (Notification Message) 傳送至適當之 或 的控制代碼。

span.span: The handle to use to route the notification message to the appropriate or .

param.name: lpIDataObject
param.span: 指標，指向其中包含關於範圍或結果項目之內容資訊物件上的 。

span.span: A pointer to the on the object containing context information about the scope or result item.

summary.span: 將頁面加入至屬性工作表。

span.span: Adds pages to a property sheet.

Docs.returns: | 傳回值 | 描述 | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | CreatePropertyPages 已成功新增屬性工作表頁面。| Return Value | Description | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | The CreatePropertyPages successfully added the property sheet pages. | | S\_FALSE | CreatePropertyPages 沒有新增任何屬性工作表頁面。| | S\_FALSE | The CreatePropertyPages added no property sheet pages. | | E\_UNEXPECTED | 發生未預期的錯誤。| | E\_UNEXPECTED | An unexpected error occurred. | | E\_INVALIDARG | 一或多個參數無效。| | E\_INVALIDARG | One or more parameters are not valid. |

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關使用程式設計介面和 Microsoft Management Console (MMC)，請參閱 < [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

Public Function QueryPagesFor (lpDataObject As IDataObject) As Integer

param.name: lpDataObject
param.span: 指標，指向其中包含關於範圍或結果項目之內容資訊物件上的 。

span.span: A pointer to the on the object containing context information about the scope or result item.

summary.span: 判斷物件是否需要頁面。

span.span: Determines whether the object requires pages.

Docs.returns: | 傳回值 | 描述 | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | 此資料物件已存在屬性。| Return Value | Description | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | Properties exist for this data object. | | E\_UNEXPECTED | 發生未預期的錯誤。| | E\_UNEXPECTED | An unexpected error occurred. | | E\_INVALID | 參數無效。| | E\_INVALID | The parameter is not valid. | | 任何其他錯誤碼 | 沒有為資料物件提供任何頁面。| | Any other error code | No pages are supplied for the data object. |

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關使用程式設計介面和 Microsoft Management Console (MMC)，請參閱 < [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).
